price: Dirão: "Permanecemos um dia ou parte de um dia; então, pergunta aos enumeradores."
arabic: قَالُواْ لَبِثۡنَا يَوۡمًا أَوۡ بَعۡضَ يَوۡمٖ فَسۡـَٔلِ ٱلۡعَآدِّينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qālū labith'nā yawman aw baʿḍa yawmin fasali al-ʿādīna
